trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection> type allows access to the elements of the `authorization` section collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object to the collection.
The collection must not already contain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule> object you are adding.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object to add to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object already exists in the collection, or the collection is read-only.
Removes all <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> objects from the collection.
This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to clear all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file.
All elements defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file are removed.
Gets the type of this <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection"></xref>.
A value from the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType"></xref> enumeration representing the type of this collection.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> at the specified index.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> index.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> at the specified index.
Gets the collection index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object whose index is returned.
The index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object.
Gets or sets an item in this collection.
<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> collection index
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> at the specified index.
Removes a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object from the collection.
This method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file for any element defined in a higher-level configuration file.
If the element is defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file.
The object to remove must exist in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object to remove.
The passed <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object does not exist in the collection, the element has already been removed, or the collection is read-only.
Removes a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object from the collection at the specified index.
This method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file for any element defined in a higher-level configuration file.
If the element is defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file.
The object to remove must exist in the collection.
The index location of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> to remove.
There is no <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object with the specified index in the collection, the element has already been removed, or the collection is read-only.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object to the collection at the specified index.
The index location at which to add the specified <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRuleCollection"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule"></xref> object to be added.
